mapper.select: select a.id,a.bianhao,a.chuliang,a.cailiao,b.stones_name as cailiaoming from wh_cangchu a left join dic_stones b on a.cailiao=b.id order by a.bianhao
select count(bianhao) from wh_cangchu where bianhao=#{bianhao}
select count(bianhao) from wh_cangchu where bianhao=#{bianhao} and id!=#{id}
